title: Move2Improve
blurb: Allows physical therapists to quantify progress and admin PT to patients simultaneously, w VR reaching app

team.name: Roghayeh (Leila) Barmaki
team.about:
In Move2Improve, I worked on ideation, design, project presentation, animation, and code development.
I also had a role of subject matter expert in physical therapy game design.

team.name: Betsy Skrip
team.about: I thought of the name Move2Improve, worked on ideation and design, drew the line drawing of the fish, and in Maya created and animated the 3D model of the fish.

content_html: Want to partner with us or get more information? Reach out to us: brian.cohn@usc.edu, and rlb@udel.edu
